item.title: Microsoft Releases Windows Embedded CE 6.0 Plus Source Code
item.description: Microsoft officially launched Windows Embedded CE 6.0 today!, There are many improvements like: kernel enhancements, improved tools(Visual Studio 2005), and it is now 100% shared source. View the Windows Embedded CE 6.0 Virtual Launch Event here Download Windows Embedded CE 6.0 180 day evaluation Windows Embedded CE 6.0 Source Code
